query: SELECT c.name as category_name, COUNT(l.id) as listing_count FROM cnrtp_listings l JOIN cnrtp_categories c ON l.categoryId = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY listing_count DESC LIMIT 15
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2jtK6pbijCvvy3B.1f9568ca23c1 --database n3qmvwxZjKdWt4fK6B7Gwx --execute SELECT c.name as category_name, COUNT(l.id) as listing_count FROM cnrtp_listings l JOIN cnrtp_categories c ON l.categoryId = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY listing_count DESC LIMIT 15
